title: Salmonella could be combated by enhancing body's natural process

title_detail.value: Salmonella could be combated by enhancing body's natural process

summary: Autophagy -- the process of recycling cellular material in the body -- can help combat Salmonella and other pathogens, according to researchers who have studied how autophagy can get rid of bacteria, and prevent diseases developing.

summary_detail.value: Autophagy -- the process of recycling cellular material in the body -- can help combat Salmonella and other pathogens, according to researchers who have studied how autophagy can get rid of bacteria, and prevent diseases developing.
